name: Pyramid Crypt Puzzle
description:
This is a short game called Pyramid Crypt Puzzle. I built it in Unity across several months while learning about game development in a class at Montana State University. This was originally a school project, however I decided to finish it outside of class.

You can see my scripts and other work at: https://github.com/Oxmoon/gagehilyard

You can contact me at:  gagehilyard@gmail.com

Special thanks to my friends Hunter Sowers and Matt Vander Sande.

If you would like to get in touch with Matt for collaboration please see his contact info and websites here:

MVanderSandeprojects@gmail.com

https://vandersandeprojects.wixsite.com/vandersandeprojects

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCOLcJKGpc4pIE8dKkhWjalw
